title: Two more players for ranked 5s.
body: Looking for mid,top,jg or supp. But you need a back up roll you can play as you might not be able to play that role as we have 7 players but want 9 so we can play more often. bronze 1 is the min rank, anything above is fine. You need a mic.

replies.body: Add me :) ill be keen for a few. Im available most nights after 6pm GMT8
I'm best mid. I can play all of the listed roles though.
